entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 5:56 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.8°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -20.0°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
